name: C Huerta
text: Fast but very good pizza, I usually get the "Hot Link", add extra jalapeños and roasted garlic. Staff is very friendly, very helpful, always with a smile. I recommend eating here.

name: Matthew O.
text: Very good pizza with many options, it's nice that you can order half of a pizza as well. Tried their white pizza and their BBQ chicken pizza. Both were very good. The BBQ sauce is a little to sweet for me but still tasty. They also have all …More

name: Kim Pinkstaff
text: Ordered and paid online. Missing s’more cookies I paid for. No one answers and no refund of my money. In the one on Central ave can never get them to bake well done. No longer a customer if I can’t reach a store. They will not answer.

name: Mina Serif
text: Best Pizza in Arizona by far 👌  people very polite and welcoming 😀  Definitely one of my favorite places to go in Phoenix. Definitely recommend 👌

name: Jose Vega
text: I just got food from this location less than an hour ago. The pizza tasted okay but It was sloppy and looked unappetizing. One slice only had one pepperoni and we added bacon to our pizza but It hardly had any on It. Overall I wasn't happy …More

name: Matthew Brown
text:
Dough could be better. It rips while holding it. If it was thinner, and held up better id like it just as much as MOD, but it doesnt stack up.
Not unsatisfied with flavor or Blaze overall, but perfection is in the details.

name: 702sunshineizfine
text:
Can’t reach the store.
Can’t put core ingredients ( GREEN STRIPE HAS ARUGULA) and the pizza is burnt. Awful thanks

name: Andrew McKelvy
text: Place is amazing use ANDREWMCK3675 to sign up with rewards and get a free drink

name: Tina McKinney
text: Getting better every day, Lovee the white top (pay add chicken and even spinach and it's the bomb). Great place for kids and families. Day time lunch is slow so no wait.

name: Bethany DeLong
text: This place is awesome. You can't beat the price for how many toppings you can pick. The staff is very friendly and helpful as well

name: J.R. Hayes II
text: Good pies and set up. A little longer in the oven though.

name: Blanca Carrillo
text: Always amazing no matter which location we go to. By far the best pizza! The crust and fresh ingredients make all the difference. The friendly staff and awesome drinks are just a bonus! Love Blaze!

name: J L
text: The food at Blaze isn’t bad, unfortunately the service often is. Online orders are fun, if you enjoy ordering one thing and receiving something else that is. Doesn’t seem too difficult to add a list of toppings printed in front of you to a pizza, and yet, here we are again. Should change your name from Blaze Pizza to Mystery Pie.

name: Cody Raybourn
text: First time here could not have been better. The food is delicious. The ingredients taste fresh, and full of flavor, and the build-your-own option is convenient! …More

name: Will Brazil
text: Great service. Great and fresh food. Followed CDC COVID requirements. Thank you Blaze on Bell rd for making our Big & Little day so enjoyable. …More

name: Sky S.
text: Best customizable pizza, quality ingredients, great selections of options and all at a economical price.

name: Chad Michael Lawson
text: Good clean store. Nice people. Fast good pizza with vegan options

name: jediantilles
text: Great pizza! The dough knots were not what I expected but still good. The store was really good too!

name: Claudia Polanowski
text: I have tried all of the build your own pizza places and this one definitely needs some work. They had fresh ingredients, they had really good sauces, wonderful cheese and I do believe that they use wood to bake their pizzas.  However there …More

name: Abbey
text: I love the concept of the place! Build your own pizza...like subway. I can get on board with it!! I love that you can put as many toppings as you want on it!! Garlic pesto knots were good, but probably wouldn’t buy them again due to being a …More

name: Dalmesha Sloss
text: Our garlic knots were cold which was ok for our 2 year old but we didn't enjoy it. Our pizza was hot and fresh but the flavor was not too great! Maybe it was just a bad day because everytime we've gone here it's been good. This time was very off!

name: Cody Opdenhoff
text: Fresh food at a great price. A wonderful addition to the community. Pizzas are made to order, in front of you and are quick. And to top it of a $3 draft (avoid the pitcher tho), I’ve been here many times and will return many more.

name: Robert Solis
text: Why did this place have to open so close to us moving. Their Pizza is the best pizza we have found in the area. For such a low price, you can build a pizza exactly to your specifications and let me tell you there are a ton of different toppings. Try the goat cheese.

name: Teresa Kerby
text: 1st time there-good food!!

name: Austin Garant
text: My experience at blaze pizza was amazing! There was this one worker named Rene and he was awesome. He made one of the best pizzas I have ever laid hands on.

name: Cyndi
text: Love this place...the goat cheese is a bonus!!!

name: Miguel Zarraga
text: We are here most Fridays  my kids love to make their own pizza just  the way they like it.  This person in front of us did not like what he ordered so he order anther one but when he got to the register he want to pay for it the cashier …More

name: Elena Polikarpova
text: The best pizza place. They have a lot of veggies and vegan cheese

name: Danielle Loraso
text:
The product is good, when they get it right.

I have really struggled to get app orders correct. Some really bizarre mistakes. …More

name: Amber Thompson
text: Incredibly good food, excellent customer service. Bless them for standing in front of that fire all day, I sure couldn't do it. Regardless Everyone that works here is always in a good mood and they get those pizzas out pretty damn efficiently. 10/10 Will be back for more!!

name: Caiya Cravens
text: Best pizza you will ever taste. They offer a lot of tasty options so go all out with your toppings! Pesto sauce alone is worth 5 stars.

name: Jerry Bianco
text: My daughter and I decided to give Blaze a try tonight. I did not get a receipt, and realized I may have been overcharged. When I asked about it I received EXCELLENT customer service as the team worked to make it right. I have worked in …More

name: harun
text: I love it because it has that good taste that make you want more. My favorite part about this place is that you can make your own pizza, the only bad thing is that you cant choose between normal sized crust and thin crust. Thin crust is your only option. Very good pizza place though.

name: Sara Fellers
text: Ordered online and had too much sauce and hardly any cheese. Worst pizza ever!

name: Brandon McKay
text: Good food, nice people, good beer selection, fair prices. Nice establishment overall. Only issue is their app and online ordering currently experiencing issues but I have heard they are in the works on it

name: Victor
text: Really good hand made pizza

name: Bailey Skuppin
text: The people that are working today need to be re trained.

name: K X S
text: Excellent customer service that begins as soon as you walk in.  Upon opening the door you'll hear personal greeting that always sounds sincere. The customized ordering process is easy...it's pizza, it's build your own...it's fresh...it's …More

name: radic a.
text: we come here all the time but today unfortunately today was 2 idiots employees.

name: Esther Conort
text: First off, Pizza taste and quality is pretty consistent between the various Blaze locations. This review is on my specific customer service experience. …More

name: Anita Matteh
text: Love the pizza and the customer service they provide great job!!!

name: Carole Federer
text: Fast service and great pizza

name: Robert Campbell
text: The management here is so nice! However it's frustrating to see an employee place one pepperoni on a pizza every 3 seconds because he's too intetested in flirting with his coworker. That's the guy with short dreads and glasses. Couldn't …More

name: robert burris
text: Blaze is awesome. Think subway but with pizza. Pick your toppings load it up customize it with sauces. I finish with arugala and balsamic glaze at the end. Sizes are smaller but will fill 1 hungry person. Prices are pretty good and they do run specials.

name: Sue Anderson
text:
The food was awesome,
The help , not so much .the young woman  cutting &putting your  pizza in a box , must hv rubbed her nose, min.4 times , no gloves  just doing my half a pizza , …More

name: Shanerz21
text: Fast, fresh, and delicious personal pizzas. If you're with a friend and not that hungry, sharing one pie is just enough. I only hope they return to selling beer and wine very soon!

name: Daniel Lindegren
text: 4.3 stars with 700 something reviews. These reviews must be fake, or you guys are out of your mind. This pizza is horrible. Took one bite and it went straight in the trash.

name: James Ketcham
text: This how a pizza should look here. Don't disrespect the pizza Gods by having your little basic two topping normie pizza. Get the build your own, dummy thicc, Unlimited toppings means go crazy, there's no wrong way to play, so have it your way REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!

name: Anonymous BuckeyeFan
text: Love the concept...so much to try your own combinations! Great choices for those on a modified diet! Gluten Free Crust is an option! No sauce if you can't do traditional red sauce..they also have white, as well.

name: Rob Rossi
text: I go to this location quite often. I received a mailer for there new large pie. On it says you can order online or carryout. So I went to the store and they would not honor my coupon.  Spoke to manager and he would not honor it. Im no longer going to go to them anymore. What a way to lose a regular customer

name: Sean Osborne
text: Pizza and service was good. My only complaint is about their cups not having straws. I wouldn’t have a problem except I have a toddler. Toddlers don’t do well with the cups they have. If you have a small child definitely bring your own sippy cup for them

name: Beau Haslam
text: Real deal here! Beer on tap, great pizza and their gluten free pizza is just as good.

name: Rebekah Zemansky
text: Good customer service, straightforward menu that's easy to modify as desired, good food

name: Colin Baker
text: Two good pizzas for $14. William was awesome and extremely helpful. Feel sorry he has to deal with the rest of the bratty staff. Overall a good place

name: Meka Van Dyke
text: The food was pretty good, the service workers could be a little more Interactive with the customers but other than that they are very informative.

name: Rick Socha
text: Placed an order online for 2 large pizzas, and was responded with a 40-45 minute wait. I showed up 50 minutes after ordering, made my way to the congested pickup area, and said what I was there for, only to be told they were out of large …More

name: Mike Van Andre
text: Friday, 1/17/2020 at approx 6:00 pm. This was a eat-it-there order. Two pizzas, nothing fancy. The place was chaotic, at best, slow. I am immuno-suppressed (I wear a mask after chemo) and cannot have food which just sits out in the open. …More

name: James Peterson
text: There is nothing not to like when you have a choice of fresh ingredients and put whatever you want on your pizza! In and out in a few minutes and a delightfully different taste than generic take out pizza!

name: Carlotta Smith
text: One of my favorite pizza places! Love the old school pizza making!! Authentic Italian taste at valuable prices. The lunch special is a steal!!

name: Aaron Clegg
text: The pizza is pretty good.  Definitely a decent break from the norm.

name: Danielle Williams
text: Well this was my first time ever eating at Blaze pizza and I have to say I was so very disappointed. I ordered online at 6:30pm I was told my pizza would be done by 7:25pm but was not done until 7:50pm then when I got home there was so much …More

name: Stephanie Ghigo
text: Absolutely fantastic! From the moment you walk in until you leave, you are treated like family. The pizza was incredible! Freshest ingredients I've ever had on a pie! Custom made my way! Too bad there's only 5✳️! They deserve 10!

name: Matt Dunn
text: Great food, with friendly and welcoming staff. Only problem I had here was the placement of the hanging menu. With a long line, you can't see what you want to order til you're around the corner and next to order

name: Robert Mireles
text: We waited 35 mins in line to order a pizza. We waited another 10 mins for our pizza to come out. It was sitting on the side for awhile. The workers were very rushed and sloppy with miscommunication. The station areas were dirty and a mess. …More

name: Bxnned2k
text: giovanni zuniga is an amazing worker... is outstanding shows up every single shift on time and always has postive things to say

name: Jon Schwab
text: Amazing pizza, and even better service

name: Olmanwrinkles Yay
text: Poor service. They had four people working and I placed my order about 15 minutes ahead of time. Waited inside for twenty more minutes for ONE pizza.

name: Melissa Hardy
text: Ordered a "green stripe" pizza through the app. Picked it up and didn't look at it before I left. Opened the lid when I got home and the pizza is missing all of the essentials that make it a green stripe. Specifically the green pesto sauce …More

name: Cali Maryan
text: Super friendly people! I tried the keto crust and it was amazing! I love that they build the pizza right in front of you.

name: Led Ja
text: Love the pizza.  Awesome place to eat, very clean. Had great prep service from Alexis and Thomas cooked them perfectly. I'll be back once I'm out of the food coma.

name: Daniel Gray
text: Customizable pizza for a good price. Healthy alt to other pizza joints. Freely made in front of you.

name: Matt Curtis
text: Amazing cauliflower crust pizza

name: shane nordby
text: OMG , I will definitely be back. Great service and the PIZZA is Ridiculously good.

name: Samantha O'Neal
text: I love this pizza place. I always build my own it's the same price as their specialty.

name: Tami Amend
text: Love the food. Pizza was good. Crust was great and choice of toppings incredible.

name: Ruth Malau'ulu
text: Today was my first time trying Blaze pizza and it was delicious. I ordered the original crust with bbq chicken topping 😋. I'll be back for more. Go try it out people if you haven't.

name: Bradley Carducci
text: I come in almost every week for my lunch breaks and I don’t see myself stopping! Food is amazing and the employees are all so friendly and welcoming. Highly recommended!!

name: elle shimel
text: Went in to get lunch after a long day at work and the whole staff was SO friendly! Mario was very helpful and made me feel very welcome!

name: Julisha Schnieder
text: Was a little frustrated this visit.  I come here very often as I love the food and I love the atmosphere.  I came in and waited for several minutes while other pizzas were being made before serving me for people not even in front of me in …More

name: Janet Jablonski
text: The best and fastest pizza. Will definitely go again.

name: Monique Hafler
text: Nice lunch specials.  White sauce pizza was ok.  Sauce needed something..more spices maybe.  Would be even better lunch deal if they offered a small salad for a few extra bucks.  Friendly service.  Great location of Bell and 9 street.

name: S S Johnson
text: It was a great atmosphere all around. It was my first visit on March 8th and the employee helped me out and explained the menu options available to me. Clean restrooms and dining area. When people leave their areas an employee immediately comes over and cleans off the table.

name: Michael Rajman
text: Walked in on a slow Sunday night to be greeted by some punk teen that can’t even make eye contact when speaking to someone, takes three tries to make my dough and then doesn’t even cook the pizza all the way. Pieology closed down or is …More

name: Victoria Lee
text: The food is pretty good, kinda pricey but not bad. Employees are friendly, very helpful, and work quickly so there's not usually to bad of a wait. Its kept very clean. Menu was well organized and easy to read. They do have a good $5 lunch special also.

name: - Jato
text: Keto crusts, get it hope you like it... Awesome!

name: Brian Dickey
text: This place is amazing. There are tons of options for toppings. They do a great job cooking it so your pizza doesn't come out burned. Prices are fair. And they have an amazing keto crust. Other pizza places have cauliflower  crust but theirs …More

name: Susan Fraley
text: It's Okay and fun to watch them make the pizzas. The staff were wonderful. Just didn't care for the crust that much,but the pizza with the crumbled meatballs was tasty.

name: Jennifer Mireau
text: Great toppings!

name: Coleman Anderson
text: This place has the wow factor. I love the service, great ingredients, and a great price. It's not fast food but food served fast. The pizzas are the perfect size too. I love their drink selection of teas and lemonades.Having the half boxes to take home helps a lot.

name: Andrea Killebrew
text: Waited forever ,only 3 other people in store.didnt have any items stocked..very snooty.

name: Bryce Wilson
text: Blaze rocks. The pizzas are sized just right and great healthy choices. You can really see this place from the road. Lots of wheelchair accessible parking and entrance. The prices are really good for how much food you get. You can order ahead even use Uber eats. They even have a nice view of lookout mountain if you dine in.

name: Gr8 Shotsz
text:
Great pizza reasonable price,
Make it like you like it!!!

name: Denise Hill
text: We decided to try Blaze pizza and were not disappointed! The pizza is delicious. Loved the whole process of watching our pizzas being made. We will be coming back again.

name: Precious Gates
text: I had a complication with my order the Manager was not helpful in anyway shape or form. Neither were the employees. I hope they receive some kind of  disciplinary punhisment. The manager was rude and started to raise her voice I quickly shut that down. I won’t be returning anytime soon.

name: Eleanor Miner
text: We get "build your own" pizzas because I like lots of toppings & my husband only gets a few.  They have LOTS of toppings to choose from.

name: Johanna Geddings
text: Blaze Pizza was great. Love that Pesto drip!!!🤗

name: Margaret Fields
text: Great food. Slow service

text: I love blaze pizza so much , but the young blonde girl that works here should be fired , she’s annoying , rude and doesn’t do her job correctly. She seems like she’s to busy trying to act and impress everyone instead of just listening and …More

name: digital_butterfly
text: Very nice build your own pizza place. Vegan cheese option as well as gluten free, quite delicious!

name: El Esdy
text: My favorite pizza at the moment. Its fast and fresh. Good prices and they have beer.

name: Amanda H
text: I usually go to the one in Phoenix but this one was on the way to a friends. The food was good, but I can't say the same for the staff. The one in Phoenix is super upbeat and friendly, this one everyone just looked mad that they had to …More

name: Nicholas Sova
text: Always good pizza. Friendly employees. Fast service.

name: Carolynn McKeown
text: Keto crust option for low carb offered.

name: Retro Owl
text: Great little pizza place that is fast and delicious. I like the variety of toppings and adding as much as I like. Its like the fast food of pizza places.

name: Bob Martin
text: The pizza is great! Think of ordering a pizza the same way you would order Subway. You pick your crust (thin, raised  or gluten free) and then you can build your own or choose from one of their suggestions. And there are probably 20 or more …More

name: Nichole Cavnar
text: Great pizza,  great customer service.

name: Cavin Macen
text: It's really evident how much the Owner/Manager cares about this operation. Food is great. Place is clean and efficient. Staff is attentive and friendly. Absolutely LOVE coming by for a pizza and a beer!

name: Leslie Taylor
text: I love the unlimited toppings. Crust was a bit dark...either left on too long or oven is too hot. Still good though.....

name: Callie
text: Fast, tasty.  Online ordering really sealed the deal.  It was on the counter when the online app said it would be.

name: Price Viper
text: This location is always understaffed and the staff that is there is under trained, slow, and unmotivated.  Expect 30-45 minute waits on weekends and they will always be out of 4-5 toppings. Please consider going to other restaurants or locations.  This location is horrible!

name: Hannah Oldham
text: I would have really loved being able to enjoy my Bottle Cokes that I paid 5$ for with my pizza I ordered,  but they were WARM.  And i just don't feel like that's anything short of a rip off.  Don't advertise it on the menu then! List it on …More

name: Steve Virissimo
text: Very good pizza with fun toppings to choose from. Gluten and Vegan also available. Pizza's are 12". Enough to share if you're not real hungry. Reasonably priced. Beer n wine available. Plenty of free parking.

name: Michelle Rader
text: Always love this place. Everyone can get exactly what the want in their pizza. Affordable for the quality.

name: Ang O.
text: Never heard of the place but got a coupon so I tried it (so many wood fired pizza places popping up). Fresh ingredients and natural sodas clear & with cane sugar. Salads looked  soggy, it was all premade so I skipped it. Not much of a …More

name: randall richard
text: I love this place

name: Selene Garcia
text: I love this place. I have been coming here since it first opened. The staff is always super friendly and the food is always amazing

name: Kristan Elise

text: My favorite pizza place, build your own is the best. I make mine extra crispy with lots of toppings

name: Brian Smith
text: The pizza is always good however on this trip, the check out and pizza pickup left much to be desired. We arrived around 6 which understandably led to a busy rush of people.  But the absolute chaos that was checkout and pizza pick up was …More

name: Devon Castro
text: Visited on pi day and wait was long. That being said the pizza was worth the wait. They need some work when it comes to interaction for events.

name: Jared
text: Pizza was absolutely fantastic 5 stars. This place is a little new resulting in a little slower service than I would prefer, but I bet in a month I would do full 5 stars.

text:
Just had my first meal at Blaze today. Top notch. I will return.

text: Love this place, so sad to see the one so close to home closed! I hope more open!

name: Shandon Sullivan
text: Not quite five stars. Great food selection. Great service.

name: Grace Roman
text: My Sister took me here to try this place for the first time, it was great! I loved it.

name: Tina Marie Parra
text: Amazing service & food!

name: Dave Schibel
text: Been here a bunch of times now, while the taste and quality of pizza is always great, often the staff leaves plenty to be desired.  For example, this evening,  the young man who was cutting the pizzas after they left the oven, simply didn't …More

name: Abegail Ople
text:
Price-wise: Very affordable
Staffs: Very accommodating
Place: plenty of chairs, clean environment, cozy place.

name: Chareef Williams
text: The customer service is great, the pie even better. The double crust and fresh servings and the upbeat mood of the employees is spot on!

name: Sanket Bacchuwar
text: Loved the concept of customizing your own pizza, and seeing all the processes in front of you. Pizza was yummy.

name: Chris Kay
text: All I can say is AWESOME!! This is my new favorite pizza place!! Friendly and FAST service! On Mondays they have $5 pizza with unlimited toppings. The drink selection is food too!

name: Jodi Amick
text: I am a huge pizza buff and when Blaze first came to my neighborhood, I admit I was skeptical. But boy was I pleasantly surprised! It quickly became mine and my husband's favorite pizza joint. The ingredients are super fresh and amazingly …More

name: K. J.
text: I have personally never had their food. My Daughter however loves it. I like how the staff is friendly and very helpful.

name: Laura Briguglio
text: This was the first time I had ever eaten at Blaze Pizza. I actually had a really great coupon and I was very happy that I tried it. I will definitely go back.

name: Kendra R
text: Went in for a quick bite. We gave our order and was eating within 15 min. The food was great and the service excellent.

name: Cayce S
text: Fantastic!

name: AZ Foodlover4ever
text: The food here is the best, great quality for what you are paying. The staff is amazing, Alexis in particular, almost always makes my pizzas amazing and she gives the best customer service! Nice job blaze

name: John Easter
text: Lower carb options! A little pricey for what it is.

name: Matt Dittemore
text: Went for the keto crust. It was ok, but the topping flavors weren't as good as Fired Pie or MOD.

name: Jaime Chappell
text: This place is very good. They. are quick plus a great atmosphere.

name: Adam Evans
text: Great food and good prices. Lots of topping options. The process is a little slow.

name: AZ_STREET_WALKER
text: Great place to go out and eat with friends. The staff is very friendly and fast with the orders. The pizzas are almost always cooked to perfection and you can almost never go wrong with the pizzas you out together I highly recommend it.

name: Nicole Trousdale
text: Love the options here! With me having a pork allergy I love that I have other choices of meat (turkey) and lots of veggies.  Also the People are awesome!

name: LisaMarie Madrid
text: Good food, came out fast wish they had some options for kiddos.

name: Gary Bettencourt
text: I love that you can literally create your own pizza for one flat price. It might be higher than a traditional pie but once I'm done with all my toppings definitely less expensive than ordering anywhere else. Tons of great toppings to select from.

name: Q
text: don’t go here I waited in line and was skipped and they let 4 people go in front of me before I finally decided to leave they have horrible customer service and I won’t be returning here

name: Vicky Sammons
text: Prices are reasonable, wide selection, needs to use more spices

name: Love Mariah
text: Taylor is THE BEST at making pizzas. She puts on adequate toppings and always makes a good looking pie. She is by far the best employee there.She is the reason I'll always go there . Forget the other blaze pizza. Forget mod pizza, pieology and fired pie. This is the place I'll be taking my business as long as Taylor is there!

name: WINTA HILL VILLEN617
text: Usually awesome! Tonight it sucked! Way 2 much sauce! Way 2 much cheese! Not cooked enough! Worst pizza I've eva had there!

text: One of the best. Yours to build. 5 min to cook. Online TwoFer cannot be beat.

text: Fast service and great ingredients. All the employees were helpful with my precise decisions .. definitely will be back

name: Michael Nubz Haverly
text: In a world where there's a pizza place on every corner, it's hard to stand out. Blaze does exactly that! Everytime I've been in the restaurant has been clean, the staff has been friendly, and the pizza had been delicious! …More

name: Debra Esparza
text: This oven-fired pizza is now my favorite pizza ever. You can choose as many toppings as you like.  The crust and sauces are so delicious! It's a friendly and fun atmosphere.

name: Amber Brown
text: The pizza was amazing. The wait time for the pizza tho, 45 minutes. And I didnt even get everything I had ordered. I went and watched as the workers didnt move with purpose and slow motion dropped things on the floor to throw away. There should be a more efficient method of going about things to make the wait time way shorter.

name: Aaron H
text: The pizza was surprisingly good, fresh topping options, and great soft drink and tea options.  Price is a bit high, especially considering the lack of total topping options, no wood fired or brick oven, and they limit the amount of toppings you can get at a standard price.  It was good, but given the choice I'll stick to Fired Pie.

name: Ehcko
text: Great tasting brick oven pizzas. They have a nice variety of topping choices. Fast service where it only takes 3 mins to bake.

name: Thomas Andrews
text: Excellent pizza and service!

name: Destiny Selvey
text: They had amazing toppings and great spirits! They made my day even more fantastic that it already was. The costumer service from all the the employees was great! 10 out of 10 would and will come back!!!!!

text: First time trying this place- we ordered online and my husband went in to pick it up. The staff are not friendly at all. My husband walked in and they did not greet him or anything just asked "here for pick up" and proceeded to cut the …More

name: Simone Scherer
text: I drive for Uber Eats and have been picking up from here all week. It smells so good I had to try it for myself. The staff is always so friendly and the pizza is amazing. I have found my new pizza place. I love how you can add as many toppings as you want and not get charged more. I will be back soon

name: Shannon
